question:
In which among the following devices, the High-Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) is used?
  1. Set-top boxes
  2. Personal computers
  3. Blu-ray disc players
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: High-Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) was invented by Hitachi, Philips, Sony, Toshiba, Thomson, Panasonic and Quasar. It transmits audio as well as video signals in digital format.HDMI is used in set-top boxes, personal computers, video games, Blu-ray disc players and digital TVs.
